talents.name: moonglow
talents.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Healing Touch, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by ${rankIncrement}%.

talents.name: nature-s_grace
talents.description: All spell criticals grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by ${rankIncrement} sec.

talents.name: improved_healing_touch
talents.description: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by ${castReduction} sec.

talents.name: tranquil_spirit
talents.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by ${rankIncrement}%.

talents.name: improved_rejuvenation
talents.description: Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by ${rankIncrement}%.

talents.name: gift_of_nature
talents.description: Increases the effect of all healing spells by ${rankIncrement}%.

talents.name: improved_regrowth
talents.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by ${rankIncrement}%.
